metadata.title: CVE-2018-7409 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
In unixODBC before 2.3.5, there is a buffer overflow in the unicode_to_ansi_copy() function in DriverManager/__info.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-7409` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libodbc1 - 2.3.4-1.1ubuntu3
odbcinst - 2.3.4-1.1ubuntu3
odbcinst1debian2 - 2.3.4-1.1ubuntu3
unixodbc - 2.3.4-1.1ubuntu3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: unixodbc package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.3.4-1.1ubuntu3').
